# ignore OS generated files
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store

# ignore log files and databases
*.log
*.sql
*.sqlite

# ignore compiled files
*.com
*.class
*.dll
*.exe
*.o
*.so

# ignore packaged files
*.7z
*.dmg
*.gz
*.iso
*.jar
*.rar
*.tar
*.zip

# ignore development files
.editorconfig
.eslintignore
.eslintrc
.gitignore
.prettierrc
gulpfile.js
jsconfig.json
.vscode
.git
package-lock.json
package.json


# ignore build & deployment files
*.sh
./scripts
ssh.txt
ssh.json

# ignore composer
vendor

# ignore node packages
node_modules
**/node_modules

# ignore bower packages
bower_components

# ignore bootstrap
bootstrap

# ignore core wordpress folders
www/wordpress/
www/wp-content/plugins/*
www/wp-content/mu-plugins/*

# ignore build things in the "wp-content" directory
**/node_modules/
